PRICES.price-info-2: For each project, we create a clear time estimate based on your wishes. Each part is estimated separately, such as login system or overview page.

PRICES.price-info-5: If it runs a little over, we will contact you in advance and apply a fair arrangement:

PRICES.price-info-list-2: Above that: free - we cover that ourselves
PRICES.price-info-7: We estimated 10 hours and around hour 8 we notice we are running over, then we contact you and discuss the next step together.
PRICES.price-info-8: If we decide together to continue and we end up at 13 hours, you pay the full estimated price (â‚¬200) + 20% (2 hours) of the estimated price (â‚¬20) and the remaining hour is on us.
PRICES.price-info-9: This way, you always get transparency, clarity, and a fair price.

COOKIESTATEMENT.essentialCookies: Essential cookies: Necessary for the website to function properly. You cannot refuse these.
COOKIESTATEMENT.statisticalCookies: Statistical cookies: Only placed with your consent. These help us measure how many visitors the website has (via Google Analytics).

PRIVACY_POLICY.title: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.intro: At MiYou, we highly value your privacy. This policy explains which personal data we process, why we do so, and what your rights are.
PRIVACY_POLICY.section1Title: 1. What personal data do we process?
PRIVACY_POLICY.section1Item1: Name and contact details you share with us (such as email)
PRIVACY_POLICY.section1Item2: Information about your use of our website (only anonymous via cookies)
PRIVACY_POLICY.section2Title: 2. Why do we process this data?
PRIVACY_POLICY.section2Item1: To improve our website and services
PRIVACY_POLICY.section3Title: 3. With whom do we share data?
PRIVACY_POLICY.section3Text: We only share your data with third parties when necessary for our services (such as google analytics), and never without a valid legal basis or your consent.
PRIVACY_POLICY.section4Text: We do not keep your data longer than necessary for the purpose for which it was collected, unless we are legally obliged to retain it longer.
PRIVACY_POLICY.section5Text: Our website uses cookies to track statistics. You can find more information in our
PRIVACY_POLICY.section6Text: You have the right to access, correct, delete, and transfer your data. You can also object to processing or withdraw your consent.
